name: get_open_profile_status
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fresh_linkedin_profile_data.
Tool description: Reliable API for all LinkedIn Scraping Needs: profiles, companies, activities/posts, and job posts. This API scrapes data directly from LinkedIn upon request so that you'll get real-time data. Say goodbye to stale data!

We're active and responsive on this platform, please don't hesitate to drop a message in the Discussions or PM channels.
API description: Given a LinkedIn profile URL, the API will let you know if that profile is “open profile” or not. **1 credit per call.**

linkedin_url.description: The URL of the LinkedIn profile to check.
